Properties

Detail

The detail level of log files (currently not used).

Declaration
public string Detail { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.String

Currently not used.

EventErrorRoot

The root directory where the Abatab error logs are stored.

Declaration
public string EventErrorRoot { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.String

Default value is logs\debug
Remarks
  • At runtime the EventErrorRoot value is created as a sub-directory of the AbatabDataRoot.
Examples
  • If AbatabDataRoot=C:\Abatab\LIVE, and DebugEventRoot=logs\debug, then DebugEventRoot would be set to C:\Abatab\LIVE\logs\debug at runtime.

LoggingMode

The logging mode that Abatab will use when executed.

Declaration
public string LoggingMode { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.String

Default value is session
Remarks

SettingDescription
sessionOnly session logs are created.
traceOnly trace logs are created.
errorOnly error logs are created.
warningOnly warning logs are created.
allAll logs types are created.
warningDo not create any log files.

  • To create multiple types of logs, separate each type with a hyphen ("-").
